text: Incipiunt capitulae secundum marcumonginneð heafudweardo<../images/lbar.gif>forecuido<../images/lbar.gif>foremercungo aefter marcus.

Marcus euangelista dei et petri in baptismate filius atque in diuino sermone discipulus sacerdotium in israhel agens secundum carnem leuita conuersus ad fidem christi euangelium in italia scribsit ostendens in eo quod et generi suo deberet et christoMarcus ðe godspellere godes & petres in fulwiht sunu & in godcund word discipul sacerda in israhel doend æfter lichoma leuita gec<../images/etail.gif>rred to geleafa cristes godspell in italia awrat ædeawde in ðon þæt ec cynn his rehtlic were & criste.

nam initium principii in uoce prophetiae exclamationis instituens ordinem leuiticae lectionis ostendit ut praedicans praedistinatum iohannem filium zacchariae in uoce angeli enuntiantis emissum non solum uerbum caro factum sed corpus domini per uerbum diuin<../images/etail.gif>uocis animatum initio euangelicae praedicationis ostenderet ut qui haec legens sciret cui initium carnis in domino et ihesu aduenientis habitaculum deberet agnoscere atque in se uerbum uocis quod in consonantibus perdiderat inueniretforðon frumma ðæs forueardes in stefne witgeonges ceigendes<../images/lbar.gif>clioppende settendes<../images/lbar.gif>gesette endebrednise ðæs <leuites> lar<../images/lbar.gif>redes ædeaude þætte bodade foregesægd sunu zachari<../images/etail.gif>s in stefne engles sæcgende gesended ne þæt ane word lichoma geworden ah lichoma drihtes ðerh word godcundes stefn gesaweled frumma ðæs godspellesca bodes were ædeawed þætte seðe ðas redes witte he to huæm frumma lichomas in drihtne & hælendes tocymende<../images/lbar.gif>hus reht were to oncnauanne end in him word stefnes þætte in efnum sonum losad were onfunde.

denique et perfectio euangelii opus intrans et baptismo domini praedicare deum incoans non laborauit natiuitatem carnis quam in prioribus uicerat dicere sed totum inprimis expositionem deserti ieiunium numeri temtationem diaboli congregationem bestiarum et ministerium protulit angelorum ut instituens nos ad intelligendum singula in breuia compingens nec auctoritatem facti rei demeret et perficiendi operi plenitudinem non negaretæfter ðon & endung<../images/lbar.gif>fylnise godspelles werc inneode & mið fulwiht drihtnes bodiga god ongann<../images/lbar.gif>onginnende ne wann accennise lichomæs ðon in ærrum awoendat were cweða <<../images/lbar.gif>> <cwoða> ah all in ðæm f'ðmestum ðæt tal forletenes fæstern tales cunnung diables þæt somnung wildeora & hernise brohte engla þætte sette usih to oncnawanne siundrio in lytlum<../images/lbar.gif>in sceortum gemercade ne setnessa woerces alesde & ð<../images/etail.gif>s geendedad werces ðone fyllnisse ne onsoce<../images/lbar.gif>nalde onsacca.

denique amputasse sibi post fidem pollicem dicitur ut sacerdotio reprobus haberetur sed tantum consentiens fidei pr<../images/etail.gif>distinata posuit electio ut nec sic in opere uerbi perderet quod prius meruerat in genere nam alexandri<../images/etail.gif>episcopus fuitsoðða to tellanne<../images/lbar.gif>to clænsanne him after lufu<../images/lbar.gif>geleafo gehatne acueðen bið þætte mið sæcerdhad forcyðed were haefd ah þæt ane efne geðohte to lufo forewurden <<../images/lbar.gif>> <forewurdon> sette gecoreniso ne sua in woerc wordes were losad þætte ærest earnade in cynn forðon alexandriniscæ biscob wæs.

cuius per singula opus scire euangelii in se dicta disponere et disciplinam in se legis agnosceret et diuinam in carnem intellegeret naturam quae in nos primum requiri dehinc inquisita uolumus agnosci habentes mercedem exortationis quoniam qui plantat et qui rigat unum sunt qui autem incrementum præstat deus estðæs<../images/lbar.gif>his ðerh ana<../images/lbar.gif>syndrigo woerc wiste<../images/lbar.gif>to uutanne godspelles in him gecuoedna tosceada & ðone ðeodscip in him æs þætte oncnewa<../images/lbar.gif>were oncnauen þæt godcund þætte oncnewe ðæt gecynd ða ðe in us ærist eft gesoeca æfter ðon<../images/lbar.gif>soðða gesoht<../images/lbar.gif>gefregna we wallað oncnawa habbas<../images/lbar.gif>hæbbende meard fæstnunges<../images/lbar.gif>trymnises forðon seðe plontað & seðe wyrðes an aron seðe ðonne geðungennise foregearuas god is.
